beamset.name: HN 2Arc
beamset.description: Arc set for head and neck planning

beamset.name: HN 3Arc
beamset.description: Arc set for head and neck planning

beamset.name: HN 10Arc - Wide Target
beamset.description: Arc set for head and neck planning

beamset.name: AbdPelv Central 2Arc
beamset.description: Arc set for 24 degree posterior avoidance

beamset.name: AbdPelv Central 3Arc
beamset.description: Arc set for 24 degree posterior avoidance with 270 degree collimator rotation

beamset.name: Brai CentralAnterior 5Arc
beamset.description: Arc set for a central anterior target in the brain

beamset.name: Brai CentralMid 6Arc
beamset.description: Arc Set for treating brain targets near the central-mid area.

beamset.name: Brai CentralPosterior 6Arc
beamset.description: 6 Arc arrangement for treatments of central posterior targets, eg. central occipital and cerebellar.

beamset.name: Brai LeftAnterior 5Arc
beamset.description: 5 Arc arrangement for treatment of targets in left anterior brain, e.g. left frontal/temporal targets.

beamset.name: Brai LeftMid 5Arc
beamset.description: 5 arc arrangement for treatment of lesions in the left-mid brain, e.g. lesions in the left temporal/parietal lobes

beamset.name: Brai LeftPosterior 5Arc
beamset.description: 5 Arc arrangement for treatment of left posterior targets in the brain, e.g targets in the left hemisphere in the occipital or cerebellar regions.

beamset.name: Brai RightAnterior 5Arc
beamset.description: 5 Arc arrangement for treatment of a right anterior brain lesion, e.g. a target in the right hemisphere frontal or temporal lobe.

beamset.name: Brai RightMid 5Arc
beamset.description: 5 arc arrangement for treatment of targets in the right mid brain, e.g. lesions in the right hemisphere and parietal or temporal lobes.

beamset.name: Brai RightPosterior 5Arc
beamset.description: 5 arc arrangement for treatment of right posterior targets in the brain, e.g. lesions that are located in the right hemisphere in the occipital lobe or cerebellum.

beamset.name: Brai SRS UW 5Arc Full
beamset.description: SRS Arc set for a single target

beamset.name: Brai SRS UW 2Target 10 Arc Full
beamset.description: SRS Arc set for a two targets

beamset.name: Brai WBHA
beamset.description: 4 Arc arrangement for treatment of the whole brain using hippocampal avoidance.

beamset.name: Bre/Chw Left 4Arc
beamset.description: 4 Arc arrangement for treating the left breast or chestwall.

beamset.name: Bre/Chw Right 4Arc
beamset.description: 4 arc arrangement for treating the right breast or chestwall.

beamset.name: LungAbd Left 2Arc
beamset.description: 2 arc arrangment for treatment of the left lung or abdomen.

beamset.name: LungAbd Left 2Target 4Arc
beamset.description: 4 arc arrangment for treatment of the left lung or abdomen.

beamset.name: LungAbd Left NORPM 4Arc
beamset.description: 4 Arc arrangement for treatment of the left lung or abdomen. Couch kicks are used which will make RPM difficult.

beamset.name: LungAbd Right 2Arc
beamset.description: 2 Arc arrangement for treating the right lung or abdomen.

beamset.name: LungAbd Right 2Target 4Arc
beamset.description: 4 Arc arrangement for treating the right lung or abdomen.

beamset.name: LungAbd Right NORPM 4Arc
beamset.description: 4 Arc arrangement for treatment of the right lung or abdomen. Not appropriate for treatment which uses RPM due to couch kicks.
